name: Smarthouse Creative
tagline: Engage Your Fans + Convert Your Audience
description:
Smarthouse Creative is a full-service digital media and audience engagement agency focused on promoting and amplifying the work of independent filmmakers, film festivals, arts organizations, startups, and brands.
From publicity to social media strategy to video production to public relations to digital marketing to web design, Smarthouse Creative offers individually-tailored strategies to ensure your film, brand or organization is reaching the largest number of the right people.

locations.address: Wework La Brea 925 N. La Brea Ave.
